titlestmt.titleproper: Presbyterian Ministers' Association of Minneapolis records 1908-1918
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Presbyterian Ministers' Association of Minneapolis records

bioghist.p: The Presbyterian Ministers' Association of Minneapolis was a group of clergymen who met regularly for mutual fellowship. At the meetings, the members heard papers read and held discussions on a variety of topics. The Association met weekly from October to May.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of minutes of the Presbyterian Ministers' Association of Minneapolis, 1908-1913 and 1913-1918. Minutes include election of officers, brief reports, listings of papers read at meetings, mentions of books reviewed at meetings, and routine business of the Association. The minutes also include a copy of the constitution of the Association and a program for the 1916-1917 season of meetings listing papers given.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
